item.title: Testing Post
item.description: using Moq; using Xunit; namespace BasicAAATestExample { public interface IUser { string GetFullname(); string Firstname { get; set; } string Lastname { get; set; } } public class User : IUser { public string Firstname { get; set; } public string Lastname { get; set; } public string GetFullname() { return $"{Firstname} {Lastname}"; } } public class Notify { private IUser _user; public Notify(IUser user) => _user = user; public string GetMessage() => $"{_user.
